files.description: Single deterministic entrypoint script that creates /outputs/run_stamp.json and /outputs/run.log with a fixed schema and stable content.
Library module implementing deterministic artifact generation, schema validation helpers, and filesystem writing utilities used by scripts/run.py and tests.
Pytest suite asserting that running scripts/run.py produces outputs/run_stamp.json and outputs/run.log and that run_stamp.json matches the fixed schema and deterministic values.
Project configuration declaring package metadata, pytest configuration, and dependencies required to run the entrypoint and tests.

missionDescription: Implement a single entrypoint script (e.g., scripts/run.py) that writes /outputs/run_stamp.json and /outputs/run.log deterministically; add pytest to assert these files exist and match a fixed schema.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Establishes a minimal runnable computational skeleton that deterministically writes artifacts and includes at least one pytest to verify artifact creation. This creates a repeatable 'definition-of-don...
